Madjid Albry (amụrụ ya na 23 Julaị 1990) bụ onye Nijeria bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-eme egwuregwu n'etiti.
A mụrụ ya na Belbege, Niger, Albry malitere ọrụ ya na otu egwuregwu nke ndị German FC St
Pauli tupu ya abịanye aka na nkwekọrịta na Werder Bremen na 1 Julaị 2007. O mere nke mbụ ya maka Werder Bremen II na 15 Septemba 2009 na 3
Na 21 Mee 2010, e gosipụtara na a gaghị emezigharị nkwekọrịta ya ma ọ nwere ike ịhapụ klọb ahụ na 30 June 2010.
Na 23 Jenụwarị 2010, ọ kwupụtara na ya na FC Oberneuland bịnyere aka. Na Jenụwarị afọ 2011 ọ sonyeere Altona 93.
